data.lyric:
[ti:Dark Side Of The Moon (Explicit)]
[ar:Lil Wayne/Nicki Minaj]
[al:Tha Carter V (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Dark Side Of The Moon - Lil Wayne (李尔·韦恩)/Nicki Minaj (妮琪·米娜)
[00:00.37]Lyrics by：Jonah Christian/Dwayne Carter/Onika Maraj/Jamal Reid
[00:00.74]Composed by：Jonah Christian/Dwayne Carter/Onika Maraj/Jamal Reid
[00:01.11]Produced by：Bloque/Jonah Christian
[00:01.49]Lil Wayne：
[00:12.96]As I wipe the stars off the windows on my space ship
[00:17.35]Call out the spirits in my basement
[00:20.65]Crawl out the center of the snake pit
[00:23.84]And fall into the middle of her greatness
[00:26.22]Fireballs reflect off the frames of the pictures
[00:29.55]She's not at all impressed with the flames or the flickers
[00:32.63]But take her for a walk on the moon as she wear slippers
[00:36.06]The end of the world is coming soon I'ma miss it
[00:39.07]The sky is falling down I am falling for her quicker
[00:42.33]We hide amongst the clouds then we pardon the enigma
[00:45.70]High above the ground but I'm under her charisma
[00:48.66]Her sound is in surround when I'm in her solar system
[00:52.07]The quiet calms my quasars the eclipse is eclipsin'
[00:55.31]My astronaut helmet kinda shifted full of lipstick
[00:58.67]Planet of the aches and she is my prescription
[01:01.81]We out of this world baby we have been evicted
[01:05.09]Lil Wayne/Nicki Minaj：
[01:05.95]Intergalactical love
[01:08.95]The sky is falling intergalactical intergalactical love
[01:16.32]And I'll be waiting for you for you for you
[01:20.28]On the dark side of the moon
[01:22.73]Said I'll be waiting I'll be waiting for you
[01:26.64]On the dark side of the moon
[01:29.12]And if you happen to get there before me
[01:32.64]Leave a message in the dust just for me
[01:35.65]If I don't see it I'll be waiting for you
[01:39.60]On the dark side of the moon yeah yeah yeah yeah
[01:44.65]Nicki Minaj：
[01:46.34]I open up the curtains
[01:49.99]Window-watchin' people killin' robbin'
[01:54.33]The sky is fallin' fallin' down
[02:00.86]I turn in to news and this is the apocalypse
[02:04.93]People livin' on their rocket ships
[02:07.30]My mama always told me that there would be no stoppin' this
[02:12.35]Fireball reflections on the friends and the pictures in my room
[02:16.26]Of I and you
[02:17.88]Tell me will I see you soon
[02:19.33]Meet you on the moon
[02:20.81]Nicki Minaj/Lil Wayne：
[02:21.99]Intergalactical love
[02:26.81]The sky is falling falling down
[02:33.38]I'll be waiting for you for you for you
[02:38.09]On the dark side of the moon
[02:40.71]I'll be waiting I'll be waiting for you
[02:44.48]On the dark side of the moon
[02:46.94]And if you happen to get there before me
[02:50.44]Leave a message in the dust just for me
[02:53.54]If I don't see it I'll be waiting for you
[02:57.58]On the dark side of the moon yeah yeah yeah yeah
[03:02.86]Lil Wayne：
[03:06.52]Said I'll be waiting I'll be waiting for you
[03:10.66]On the dark side of the moon
[03:13.06]And if you happen to get there before me
[03:16.46]Leave a message in the dust just for me
[03:19.67]If I don't see it I'll be waiting for you
[03:23.48]On the dark side of the moon yeah yeah yeah yeah
[03:28.64]Intergalactical love
[03:31.79]The sky is falling intergalactic intergalactical love
[03:38.94]And I'll be waiting for you
[03:43.08]On the dark side of the moon
[03:45.71]Said I'll be waiting I'll be waiting for you
[03:49.56]On the dark side of the moon yeah yeah yeah yeah
data.trans:
[ti:Dark Side Of The Moon (Explicit)]
[ar:Lil Wayne/Nicki Minaj]
[al:Tha Carter V (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.37]//
[00:00.74]//
[00:01.11]//
[00:01.49]//
[00:12.96]我搭乘着宇宙飞船 擦去窗户上的星星
[00:17.35]唤醒我不堪的过去
[00:20.65]从尔虞我诈的深渊里爬出来
[00:23.84]沉浸在她的无与伦比的温柔之中
[00:26.22]火球反射在墨镜的镜框上
[00:29.55]她的样子随着闪烁的火焰慢慢消逝
[00:32.63]当她穿着拖鞋时 我带着她在月球漫步
[00:36.06]世界末日即将来临 我会分外想念
[00:39.07]天空快塌下来 转眼之间 我为她神魂颠倒
[00:42.33]我们藏匿于云层深处 我们宽恕不可告人的秘密
[00:45.70]远离尘世 但是我为她意乱情迷
[00:48.66]当我沉浸在她迷人的光芒里 她的声音在耳畔回响
[00:52.07]这份宁静让我不再追名逐利 可是我们的感情急转直下
[00:55.31]我的宇航员头盔大变模样 布满口红印记
[00:58.67]充满痛苦的星球 她为我治愈伤痛
[01:01.81]我们离开这个世界 宝贝 我们遭到驱逐
[01:05.09]//
[01:05.95]跨越银河的爱恋
[01:08.95]天空正在坍塌 跨越银河的爱恋
[01:16.32]我会为你等候
[01:20.28]驻足在月之暗面
[01:22.73]我说过我会静心等待 我会为你等候
[01:26.64]驻足在月之暗面
[01:29.12]如果你碰巧比我率先抵达
[01:32.64]在漫天尘埃里为我留下信息
[01:35.65]如果我没有看见 我会为你等候
[01:39.60]驻足在月之暗面
[01:44.65]//
[01:46.34]我拉开窗帘
[01:49.99]通过窗户 看着人们杀戮劫掠
[01:54.33]天空快塌下来
[02:00.86]我调到新闻 这就是世界末日
[02:04.93]人们生活在他们的火箭飞船上
[02:07.30]我的妈妈总是告诉我 这一切势不可挡
[02:12.35]火球反射在朋友的身上 还有我房间里
[02:16.26]那张我们的合照上
[02:17.88]告诉我 我能否尽快见到你
[02:19.33]与你在月球相会
[02:20.81]//
[02:21.99]跨越银河的爱恋
[02:26.81]天空正在坍塌
[02:33.38]我会为你等候
[02:38.09]驻足在月之暗面
[02:40.71]我会静心等待 我会为你等候
[02:44.48]驻足在月之暗面
[02:46.94]如果你碰巧比我率先抵达
[02:50.44]在漫天尘埃里为我留下信息
[02:53.54]如果我没有看见 我会为你等候
[02:57.58]驻足在月之暗面
[03:02.86]//
[03:06.52]我说过我会静心等待 我会为你等候
[03:10.66]驻足在月之暗面
[03:13.06]如果你碰巧比我率先抵达
[03:16.46]在漫天尘埃里为我留下信息
[03:19.67]如果我没有看见 我会为你等候
[03:23.48]驻足在月之暗面
[03:28.64]跨越银河的爱恋
[03:31.79]天空正在坍塌 跨越银河的爱恋
[03:38.94]我会为你等候
[03:43.08]驻足在月之暗面
[03:45.71]我说过我会静心等待 我会为你等候
[03:49.56]驻足在月之暗面
